channel.title: Best forum software?
channel.description:
I'm not making a poll because I have a feeling some people would vote for the sake of voting.
What would be the best forum software for a professional website/forum?
I know enough not to get phpbb, and I have no intention on geting IB, so I'm pretyt much thinking either vBulletin, or SMF. I have no problem paying for vBulletin, so cost isnt the issue. But which is beter in terms of ease of use, security, and etc?

item.title: Best forum software?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

frank_:

whats wrong with IPB? :\

I just don’t like it for some reason.

Read full topic

item.title: Best forum software?
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

I’m pretty sure there’s a good converter for SMF to vB. My guess, since I don’t know much about the security of either, is to get SMF, and if you don’t like it or find something wrong with it, switch to vB.

Read full topic
